task.title: How to Catch the Bus
task.shortdesc: The BT is the best way to get to campus if we've taken the car.

step.info: Our apartment is on the Heathwood A line. The map will download as a PDF

step.cmd: Look at the time sheet for that bus stop
step.info: Stroubles Circle is the timed stop nearest the apartment.

step.cmd: Go to the bus stop and wait.
step.info: Plan to leave about half an hour to 45 minues before your class starts.
